code: import React,{useState}from"react";import'../assets/styles/NavBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(_ref){let{setCurrentPage}=_ref;const[active,setActive]=useState("nav__menu");const[icon,setIcon]=useState("nav__toggler");const[animateButton,setAnimateButton]=useState(false);const[shrink,setShrink]=useState(false);const navToggle=()=>{setActive(active==="nav__menu"?"nav__menu nav__active":"nav__menu");setIcon(icon==="nav__toggler"?"nav__toggler toggle":"nav__toggler");};const handleNavClick=page=>{setCurrentPage(page);setActive("nav__menu");setIcon("nav__toggler");};const handleHomeClick=()=>{setShrink(true);setTimeout(()=>{setShrink(false);setAnimateButton(true);setTimeout(()=>{setAnimateButton(false);handleNavClick('home');},600);},300);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"home__icon ".concat(animateButton?'grow':''),onClick:handleHomeClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"home-icon ".concat(shrink?'shrink':animateButton?'shadow':''),children:"\u2726"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:active,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav__link",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('about'),children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav__link",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('projects'),children:"Projects"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav__link",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('contact'),children:"Contact"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:navToggle,className:icon,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line3"})]})]});}export default Navbar;
